articles.title: Permission denied for reentry of Varda’s orbiting experiment capsule - Ars Technica
articles.description: The FAA says Varda launched its vehicle into space without a reentry license.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ Varda's reentry capsule measures nearly 3 feet (1 meter) in diameter, and will jettison from its Rocket Lab-built carrier spacecraft when the mission is ready to return to Earth.
